3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 7 pm
* 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month
* Council Chambers at the Police and Courts Building

Citizens are welcome to attend Council meetings and may speak during the Citizen Participation section.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.roysecity.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)
